sentences.sContent: It infects immune cells like this lymphocyte, causing their deaths and opening the door for opportunistic infections to swoop in.
sentences.sContent_eng: It infects immune cells like this lymphocyte, causing their deaths and opening the door for opportunistic infections to swoop in.
sentences.sCn: 它感染像淋巴细胞那样的免疫细胞，导致其死亡，并一举打开了由免疫系统缺失引起感染疾病的大门。

sentences.sContent: Their cervical lymph nodes were collected to assay the lymphocyte proliferation rate and the production of cancer killing cytokines.
sentences.sContent_eng: Their cervical lymph nodes were collected to assay the lymphocyte proliferation rate and the production of cancer killing cytokines.
sentences.sCn: 收集子宫颈淋巴结，化验淋巴细胞增殖率和癌肿杀伤激动素的产生。

words.tran: 淋巴球增多；淋巴球过多症
淋巴组织生成；淋巴细胞增殖

trans.tranOther: a type of white blood cell formed in lymphoid tissue
